trans-unit.source: Added option ‘–arch=VALUE’ which can be used to select the set of architectures for the main executable. This defaults to the set of architectures supported by the python interpreter and can be used to drop support for some architectures (for example when you’re using a python binary that supports both 32-bit and 64-bit code and use a GUI library that does not yet work in 64-bit mode).

trans-unit.source: Includes all files from packages, it should be smart enough to strip unused .py/.pyc/.pyo files (to save space, depending on which optimization flag is used).

trans-unit.source: Includes PackageInstaller tool
Introduces an experimental plugin API for data converters.
trans-unit.target: 为数据转换器引入了一个实验性的插件API。

trans-unit.source: Issue #101: Set “PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE” in the environment before calling Py_Initialize to ensure that the interpreter won’t try to write bytecode files (which can cause problems when using sandboxed applications).
trans-unit.target: 问题＃101：在调用Py_Initialize之前，请在环境中设置“ PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE”，以确保解释器不会尝试写入字节码文件（在使用沙盒应用程序时可能会导致问题）。

trans-unit.source: Issue #105: py2app can now create app and plugin bundles when the main script has an encoding other than ASCII, in particular for Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 问题#105:当主脚本的编码不是ASCII码时,py2app现在可以创建应用程序和插件捆绑包,特别是对于Python 3。

trans-unit.source: Issue #106: Ensure that the PIL recipe works on Python 3. PIL itself isn’t ported yet, but Pillow does work with Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃106：请确保PIL配方可在Python 3上使用。PIL本身尚未移植，但Pillow可以在Python 3上使用。

trans-unit.source: Issue #111: The site.py generated by py2app now contains a USER_SITE variable (with a default value of
trans-unit.target: 问题111:py2app生成的site.py现在包含一个USER_SITE变量(默认值为

trans-unit.source: Issue #13: It is now possible to add helper scripts to a bundle, for example for creating a GUI that starts a helper script in the background.
trans-unit.target: 问题13:现在可以将辅助脚本添加到一个捆绑包中,例如,创建一个在后台启动辅助脚本的GUI。

trans-unit.source: Issue #15: py2app now has an option to emulate the shell environment you get by opening a window in the Terminal.
trans-unit.target: 问题15:py2app现在有了一个选项,可以模拟在终端中打开一个窗口的shell环境。

trans-unit.source: Issue #16:
Issue #174: clean up the summary about missing modules by removing warnings about things that aren’t modules.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃174：通过删除有关非模块内容的警告来清理有关丢失模块的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Issue #17: py2applet script defaults ‘argv_emulation’ to False when your using a 64-bit build of python, because that option is not supported on such builds.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃17：当您使用64位python版本时，py2applet脚本默认将'argv_emulation'设置为False，因为这种版本不支持该选项。

trans-unit.source: Issue #19, reported by bryon(at)spideroak.com.
Issue #222: The fix for issue #179 broke the argv emulator
trans-unit.target: 问题222:问题179的修复破坏了argv模拟器。

trans-unit.source: Issue #226: Py2app could fail while reporting on possibly missing modules
trans-unit.target: 问题#226:Py2app在报告可能丢失的模块时可能会失败

trans-unit.target: 问题#228。应用捆绑包中的python可执行文件为

trans-unit.source: Issue #22: py2app will give an error when the specified version is invalid, instead of causing a crash in the generated executable.
trans-unit.target: 问题22:当指定的版本无效时,py2app会给出一个错误,而不是导致生成的可执行文件崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Issue #23: py2app failed to work when an .egg directory was implictly added to
trans-unit.target: 问题23:当一个.egg目录被隐含地添加到

trans-unit.source: Issue #26: py2app copied the wrong executable into the application bundle when using virtualenv with a framework build of Python.
trans-unit.target: 问题#26:当使用virtualenv和Python的框架构建时,py2app将错误的可执行文件复制到应用程序捆绑包中。

trans-unit.source: Issue #28: the argv emulator crashes in 64-bit mode on OSX 10.5
trans-unit.target: 问题28:在OSX 10.5上,argv模拟器在64位模式下崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Issue #30: py2app bundles failed to launch properly when the scriptfile has the same name as a python package used by the application.
trans-unit.target: 问题30:当脚本文件与应用程序使用的python包名称相同时,py2app bundles无法正常启动。

trans-unit.source: Issue #31: honor optimze flag at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 问题#31:在运行时尊重optimze标志。

trans-unit.source: Issue #32: fix crash when application uses PySide
trans-unit.target: 问题#32:修复应用程序使用PySide时的崩溃问题

trans-unit.source: Issue #33: py2app’s application bundle launcher now clears the environment variable
trans-unit.target: 问题＃33：py2app的应用程序捆绑包启动器现在清除了环境变量

trans-unit.source: Issue #37: Add recipe for pyEnchant
Issue #39: It is now possible to have subpackages on in the “packages” option of py2app.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃39：现在可以在py2app的“ packages”选项中打开子包。

trans-unit.source: Issue #43: py2app now creates a symlink named “Current” in the ‘Versions’ directory of the embedded Python framework to comply with a requirement for the Mac App-store.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃43：py2app现在在嵌入式Python框架的“版本”目录中创建一个名为“当前”的符号链接，以符合Mac App Store的要求。

trans-unit.source: Issue #5: Avoid a possible stack overflow in the bundle executable
trans-unit.target: 问题5:避免在捆绑式可执行文件中发生堆栈溢出的可能性

trans-unit.source: Issue #65: generated bundle would crash when two libraries linked to the same library using different names (one refering to the real name, the other to a symlink).
trans-unit.target: 问题 65:当两个库使用不同的名称(一个指真实名称,另一个指符号链接)链接到同一个库时,生成的 bundle 会崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Issue #65: the fix in 0.7 to avoid copying a symlinked library twice caused problems for some users because only one of the file names ended up in the application bundle. This release ensures that both names exist (one as a symbolic name to the other).
trans-unit.target: 问题 65:0.7 版中避免复制两次符号链接库的修正给一些用户带来了问题,因为只有一个文件名最终出现在应用捆绑包中。这个版本确保了两个名字都存在(一个作为符号名到另一个)。

trans-unit.source: Issue #67: py2applet didn’t work with python 3 due to the use of ‘raw_input’
trans-unit.target: 问题＃67：由于使用了“ raw_input”，因此py2applet无法与python 3一起使用

trans-unit.source: Issue #68: the “extra-scripts” feature introduced in 0.7 couldn’t copy scripts that aren’t in the same directory as “setup.py”.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃68：0.7中引入的“额外脚本”功能无法复制与“ setup.py”不在同一目录中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Issue #70: application fails to launch when script uses Windows line endings
trans-unit.target: 问题70:当脚本使用Windows行结尾时,应用程序无法启动。

Issue #76: Semi-standalone packages using extensions modules coudn’t use extensions unless they also used the
trans-unit.target: 问题＃76：使用扩展模块的半独立软件包不得使用扩展，除非它们还使用了

trans-unit.source: Issue #77: the stdout/stderr streams of application and plugin bundles did not end up in Console.app on OSX 10.8 (as they do on earlier releases of OSX). This is due to a change in OSX.
trans-unit.target: 问题 77:在 OSX 10.8 上,应用程序和插件捆绑的 stdout/stderr 流没有在 Console.app 中结束(与 OSX 早期版本一样)。这是由于OSX的一个变化。

trans-unit.source: Issue #78: Packages added using the
Issue #80: Add support for copying system plugins into the application bundle.
trans-unit.target: 问题#80:增加支持将系统插件复制到应用捆绑中。

trans-unit.source: Issue #81: Py2app now fails with an error when trying to build a bundle for a unix-style shared library build of Python (
trans-unit.target: 问题 #81:当尝试为Python的unix风格的共享库构建bundle时,Py2app现在会出错。

trans-unit.source: Issue #82: Remove debug print statement from py2app.util.LOADER that caused problems with Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 问题#82:从 py2app.util.LOADER 中删除在 Python 3 中引起问题的调试打印语句。

trans-unit.source: Issue #83: Setup.py now refuses to install when the current platform is not Mac OS X.
trans-unit.target: 问题#83:Setup.py现在拒绝安装,当当前平台不是Mac OS X时。

trans-unit.source: Issue #87: Ignore ‘.git’ and ‘.hg’ directories while copying package data (‘.svn’ and ‘CVS’ were already ignored).
trans-unit.target: 问题＃87：在复制包数据时忽略“ .git”和“ .hg”目录（“ .svn”和“ CVS”已被忽略）。

trans-unit.source: Issue #88: Ensure that the fix for #65 won’t try to create a symlink that points to itself. This could for example occur with homebrew, where the exposed lib directory contains symlinks to a cellar, while tye install_name does mention the “public” lib directory:
trans-unit.target: 问题＃88：确保针对＃65的修复程序不会尝试创建指向自身的符号链接。例如，这可能发生在自制程序中，其中公开的lib目录包含与酒窖的符号链接，而tye install_name确实提到了“公共” lib目录：

trans-unit.source: Issue #90: Removed the ‘email’ recipe, but require a new enough version of modulegraph instead. Because of this py2app now requires modulegraph 0.11 or later.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃90：删除了“电子邮件”配方，但需要足够新版本的modulegraph。由于这个py2app现在需要modulegraph 0.11或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Issue #91: Added a recipe for

Issue #92: Add option ‘–force-system-tk’ which ensures that the _tkinter extension (used by Tkinter) is linked against the Apple build of Tcl/Tk, even when it is linked to another framework in Python’s std. library.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃92：添加选项“ –force-system-tk”，以确保_tkinter扩展名（由Tkinter使用）与Apple Tcl / Tk构建链接，即使该链接与Python std中的另一个框架链接也是如此。图书馆。

trans-unit.source: Issue #94: The site-packages zipfile in the application bundle now contains zipfile entries for directories as well. This is needed to work around a bug in the zipimporter for Python 3.3: it won’t consider ‘pkg/foo.py’ to be in namespace package ‘pkg’ unless there is a zipfile entry for the ‘pkg’ folder (or there is a ‘pkg/__init__.py’ entry).
trans-unit.target: 问题＃94：应用程序捆绑包中的站点软件包zipfile现在也包含目录的zipfile条目。这需要解决Python 3.3的zipimporter中的错误：它不会将'pkg / foo.py'放在命名空间包'pkg'中，除非'pkg'文件夹有一个zipfile条目（或者是“ pkg / __ init__.py”条目）。

trans-unit.source: Issue #96: py2app should work with python 2.6 again (previous releases didn’t work due to using the sysconfig module introduced in python 2.7)
trans-unit.target: 问题＃96：py2app应该可以再次与python 2.6一起使用（以前的版本由于使用了python 2.7中引入的sysconfig模块而无法正常工作）

trans-unit.source: Issue #97: Fixes a problem with the pyside and sip recipes when the ‘qt_plugins’ option is used for ‘image_plugins’.
trans-unit.target: 问题＃97：解决了将'qt_plugins'选项用于'image_plugins'时pyside和sip配方的问题。

trans-unit.source: Issue #99: appstore requires a number of symlinks in embedded frameworks.
trans-unit.target: 问题99:appstore在嵌入式框架中需要一些符号链接。

Issue 185 in PyObjC’s tracker: sysconfig using
trans-unit.target: PyObjC的跟踪器中的第185期：sysconfig使用

trans-unit.source: Issue Tracker
Issue: #39

It is currently not possible to use a subpackage (“foo.bar”) in the list of packages for the “packages” option. Py2app now explicitly checks for this and prints an error message instead of building an application that doesn’t work.
trans-unit.target: 当前无法在“程序包”选项的程序包列表中使用子程序包（“ foo.bar”）。现在，Py2app会明确检查此内容并打印错误消息，而不是构建无法正常运行的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Items in the list are either paths, or a tuple with the plugin type and the path:
trans-unit.target: 列表中的项目要么是路径,要么是插件类型和路径的元组。

trans-unit.source: Known issues:
License
Loading scripts didn’t work when –no-chdir was used
trans-unit.target: 使用–no-chdir时，加载脚本不起作用

trans-unit.source: Looks for a hacked version of the PyOpenGL __init__.py so that it doesn’t have to include the whole package in order to get at the stupid version file.
trans-unit.target: 查找PyOpenGL __init__.py的被黑版本，以便不必获取整个软件包即可获取愚蠢的版本文件。

trans-unit.source: Major enhancements to the way plugins are built
trans-unit.target: 插件构建方式的重大改进

trans-unit.source: Make sure the stdout/stderr streams of the main binary of the application are unbuffered.
trans-unit.target: 确保应用程序主二进制的stdout/stderr流没有被缓冲。

trans-unit.source: Massively updated documentation
Migrate to GitHub
More correct
Moved the filter stack into
NOTE: The stdout and stderr streams of plugin bundles are not redirected, as it is rather bad form to change the global environment of the host application.
trans-unit.target: 注意:插件捆绑的stdout和stderr流不会被重定向,因为改变主机应用程序的全局环境是相当糟糕的形式。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: py2app must be used on OSX to build applications, it cannot create Mac applications on other platforms.
trans-unit.target: 注意:py2app必须在OSX上使用来构建应用程序,它不能在其他平台上创建Mac应用程序。

trans-unit.source: New
New –xref (-x) option similar to py2exe’s that produces a list of modules and their interdependencies as a HTML file
trans-unit.target: 类似于py2exe的新–xref（-x）选项，可将模块及其相互依赖性列表生成为HTML文件

trans-unit.source: New docutils recipe. Support for non-framework Python, such as the one provided by DarwinPorts.
trans-unit.target: 新的docutils食谱。支持非框架Python，例如DarwinPorts提供的Python 。

trans-unit.source: New PyOpenGL example.
New PyQt example.
New EggInstaller example
New datamodels option to support CoreData. Compiles .xcdatamodel files and places them in the Resources dir (as .mom).
trans-unit.target: 新增支持CoreData的数据模型选项。编译.xcdatamodel文件,并将其放置在Resources目录下(作为.mom)。

trans-unit.source: New features:
New prefer-ppc option
New recipe for PyOpenGL. This is very naive and simply includes the whole thing, rather than trying to monkeypatch their brain-dead version acquisition routine in
trans-unit.target: PyOpenGL的新配方。这非常幼稚，仅包含整个内容，而不是尝试在Windows中猴子拼死地获取例程

trans-unit.source: New recipes: numpy, scipy, matplotlib
New use-pythonpath option. The py2app application bootstrap will no longer use entries from PYTHONPATH unless this option is used.
trans-unit.target: 新增use-pythonpath选项。除非使用这个选项,否则py2app应用程序的引导将不再使用PYTHONPATH的条目。

trans-unit.source: No longer defaults to LSPrefersPPC
None
Note
Note that for unclear reasons the redirection doesn’t work on OSX 10.12 at the moment.

trans-unit.target: 注意：这只是一个警告，当依赖关系树包含适用于其他主要版本的python的模块时，语法错误将有效（例如，compat_py2模块包含适用于Python 2的兼容代码且包含无效的Python 3的代码）

trans-unit.source: Now ensures that the executable is +x (when installed from egg this may not be the case)
trans-unit.target: 现在确保可执行文件是+x(当从蛋中安装时,可能不是这种情况)。

trans-unit.target: 现在扫描捆绑中的所有文件,并将Mach-O加载命令标准化,而不仅仅是扩展名。这在使用

trans-unit.source: Options changed:
PR 277 (Christian Clauss): Fix some Python 3 issues
PYOBJC_BUNDLE_ADDRESS
PYOBJC_BUNDLE_ADDRESS<PID>
PackageInstaller
Patch by Alberto Sottile
Patch by Alberto Sottile.
Patch by Barry Scott.
Patch by Dan Horner.

Plugin bootstrap no longer sets PYTHONHOME and will restore PYTHONPATH after initialization.
trans-unit.target: 插件bootstrap不再设置PYTHONHOME,初始化后会恢复PYTHONPATH。

trans-unit.source: Plugin bootstrap should compile/link correctly with gcc 4.
trans-unit.target: 插件bootstrap应该正确编译/链接与gcc 4.

trans-unit.source: Plugin bootstrap swaps out thread state upon plug-in load if it is the first to initialize Python. This fixes threading issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果插件是第一个初始化Python的,那么插件加载时的线程状态会被交换。这修复了线程问题。

trans-unit.source: Project links
Pull request #15 by Armin Samii: Safer symlink and file copying
trans-unit.target: 拉取请求#15,作者:Armin Samii。更安全的符号链接和文件复制

trans-unit.source: Pull request #17: Location of site-packages in the “–user” location has changed
trans-unit.target: 提取请求17：站点包在“ –user”位置的位置已更改

trans-unit.source: Py2app also didn’t copy file permissions for files copied into application bundles, which isn’t a problem in general but did cause binaries to lose there executable permissions (as noted on Stackoverflow)
trans-unit.target: Py2app也没有为复制到应用程序捆绑中的文件复制文件权限，这通常不是问题，但是确实导致二进制文件丢失了可执行权限（如Stackoverflow所述）

trans-unit.source: Py2app copied stdlib packages into the app bundle for semi-standalone builds when they are mentioned in the ‘–packages’ option (either explicitly or by a recipe). This was unintentional, semi-standlone builds should rely on the external Python framework for the stdlib.
trans-unit.target: 当在“ –packages”选项（显式或通过配方）中提及它们时，Py2app将stdlib软件包复制到半独立构建的应用程序捆绑包中。这是无意的，半独立的构建应该依赖于外部Python框架的stdlib。

trans-unit.source: Py2app currently knows about the following plugin suffixes:
trans-unit.target: Py2app目前知道以下插件后缀。

trans-unit.source: Py2app didn’t preserve timestamps for files copied into application bundles, and this can cause a bytecompiled file to appear older than the corresponding source file (for packages copied in the bundle using the ‘packages’ option).
trans-unit.target: Py2app没有为复制到应用程序捆绑包中的文件保留时间戳，这可能导致字节编译的文件看起来比相应的源文件更旧（对于使用“ packages”选项在捆绑包中复制的包）。

trans-unit.source: Py2app now has a new option named “–qt-plugins” (or “qt_plugins” in setup.py), this option specify a list of plugins that should be included in the application bundle. The items of the list can have a number of forms:
trans-unit.target: Py2app现在有一个名为“ –qt-plugins”（或setup.py中的“ qt_plugins”）的新选项，此选项指定应包含在应用程序包中的插件列表。列表中的项目可以具有多种形式：

trans-unit.source: Py2app now supports a new option include_plugins. The value of this is a list of paths to plugins that should be copied into the application bundle.
trans-unit.target: Py2app现在支持新选项include_plugins。此值是应复制到应用程序捆绑包中的插件路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: Py2app will also give an error message when the python binary does not have a shared library (or framework) at all.
trans-unit.target: 当python二进制文件根本没有共享库(或框架)时,Py2app也会给出错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Should now correctly handle paths (and application names) with unicode characters in them.

trans-unit.source: Small tweaks to the testsuite to ensure that they work on systems with both Xcode3 and Xcode4 (Xcode3 must be the selected version).

trans-unit.source: Smarter matplotlib recipe, it is now possible to specify which backends should be included. Issue #44, reported by Adam Kovics.

trans-unit.source: Solve compatibility problem with some haxies and inputmanager plugins
trans-unit.target: 解决一些haxies和inputmanager插件的兼容性问题。

trans-unit.source: Source package now includes PJE’s setuptools extension to distutils.

trans-unit.source: Stuffit tends to extract archives recursively, which results in unzipped code archives inside py2app-created bundles. This version has a workaround for this “feature” for Stuffit.
trans-unit.target: Stuffit倾向于递归地提取档案，这会导致在py2app创建的包中存在未压缩的代码档案。此版本具有针对Stuffit的“功能”的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: The
The ‘-O’ flag of py2app now defaults to the python optimization level when using python 2.6 or later.

The encodings package now gets included in the zip file (saves space)

trans-unit.source: The few tests that there are were refactored in py.test style.
trans-unit.target: py.test样式重构了其中的一些测试。

trans-unit.source: The folder ‘Resources/Python/site-packages’ is no longer on the python search path. This folder is not used by py2app itself, but might by used by custom build scripts that wrap around py2app.
trans-unit.target: 文件夹“ Resources / Python / site-packages”不再位于python搜索路径上。py2app本身不使用此文件夹，但是包装py2app的自定义构建脚本可能会使用此文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The i386, x86_64 and intel stub binaries are now compiled with clang on OSX 10.8, instead of an older version of GCC. The other stub versions still are compiled on OSX 10.6.
trans-unit.target: i386、x86_64 和 intel 存根二进制文件现在在 OSX 10.8 上用 clang 编译,而不是旧版本的 GCC。其他的存根版本仍然是在 OSX 10.6 上编译的。

trans-unit.source: The launcher binary is now linked with Cocoa, that should avoid some problems with sandboxed applications (in particular: standard open panels don’t seem to work properly in a sandboxed application when the main binary is not linked to AppKit)
trans-unit.target: 现在，启动器二进制文件已与Cocoa链接，这应该避免沙盒应用程序出现一些问题（特别是：当主二进制文件未链接到AppKit时，标准的开放面板在沙盒应用程序中似乎无法正常工作）

trans-unit.source: The module
The package ‘lxml.isoschematron’ is not zip-safe and tries to load resources using the normal filesystem APIs, which doesn’t work when the package is part of a zipfile.
trans-unit.target: 软件包“ lxml.isoschematron”不是zip安全的，它会尝试使用常规文件系统API加载资源，而当该软件包是zipfile的一部分时，该文件将无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The packages included by a py2app recipe weren’t processed by modulegraph and hence their dependencies were not always included.
trans-unit.target: py2app配方中包含的软件包未通过modulegraph处理，因此并不总是包含它们的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: The plugins are copied into “Resources/qt_plugins” and py2app adds a “qt.conf” file that points to that location for plugins.
trans-unit.target: 插件被复制到“ Resources / qt_plugins”中，而py2app添加了一个指向插件位置的“ qt.conf”文件。

trans-unit.source: The post-filtering of modules and extensions is now generalized into a stack and can be modified by recipes
trans-unit.target: 现在,模块和扩展的后期过滤被概括为一个堆栈,并可以通过食谱来修改。

trans-unit.source: The recipe for virtualenv calls a modulegraph method that was made private in a recent release and hence no longer worked with py2app 0.9.
trans-unit.target: virtualenv的配方调用了一个modulegraph方法,该方法在最近的一个版本中被私有化,因此不再适用于py2app 0.9。

trans-unit.source: The source distribution didn’t include all files that needed to be it ever since switching to mercurial, I’ve added a MANIFEST.in file rather than relying on setuptool’s autoguessing of files to include.
trans-unit.target: 自从切换到Mercural以来，源代码发行版并未包含所有需要的文件，我添加了MANIFEST.in文件，而不是依靠setuptool的文件自动猜测来包含。

trans-unit.source: can now create plugin bundles (MH_BUNDLE) as well as executables. New recipe for supporting extensions built with sip, such as PyQt. trans-unit.source: py2app copies data files in the directory for a package into the application bundle. It also did this for directories that represent subpackages, which made it impossible to exclude subpackages.
trans-unit.target: py2app 将一个包的目录中的数据文件复制到应用程序捆绑包中。对于代表子包的目录,它也是这样做的,这使得它无法排除子包。

trans-unit.target: py2app复制资源和数据文件也失败了(在

trans-unit.source: py2app failed to copy the iconfile into application bundle (reported by Russel Owen)
trans-unit.target: py2app未能将图标文件复制到应用程序捆绑包中(Russel Owen报告)。

trans-unit.source: py2app is a Python setuptools command which will allow you to make standalone Mac OS X application bundles and plugins from Python scripts.
trans-unit.target: py2app是一个Python setuptools命令,它允许你用Python脚本制作独立的Mac OS X应用程序捆绑包和插件。

trans-unit.source: py2app is more strict w.r.t. explictly closing files, this avoids ResourceWarnings for unclosed files.
trans-unit.target: py2app在关闭文件时更加严格,这避免了未关闭文件的资源警告。

trans-unit.source: py2app is similar in purpose and design to py2exe for Windows.
trans-unit.target: py2app在目的和设计上与Windows的py2exe类似。

trans-unit.source: py2app now actually works for me (ronaldoussoren@mac.com) with a python interpreter in a virtualenv environment.
trans-unit.target: py2app现在实际上可以在virtualenv环境中使用python解释器为我工作（ronaldoussoren@mac.com）。

trans-unit.source: py2app now clears the temporary directory in ‘build’ and the output directory in ‘dist’ before doing anything. This avoids unwanted interactions between results from a previous builds and the current build.
trans-unit.target: py2app现在在执行任何操作之前先清除“ build”中的临时目录和“ dist”中的输出目录。这样可以避免先前版本和当前版本的结果之间发生不必要的交互。

trans-unit.source: py2app now persists information about the build environment (python version, executable, build style, etc.) in the Info.plist and will clean the executable before rebuilding if anything at all has changed.
trans-unit.target: py2app 现在会在 Info.plist 中保留有关构建环境的信息 (python 版本、可执行文件、构建风格等),如果有任何变化,会在重建前清理可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: py2app’s bundle launcher set the environment variable
trans-unit.target: py2app的捆绑包启动器设置环境变量
